verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We've come to praise You
'Cause You're worthy
Nobody like You in Your glory
We love to praise You
'Cause You're holy, awesome
Wonderful, mighty God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And everything that You do
Comes from a heart of love
And a hand of mercy
For You are faithful and true
Working all things for good
For those who love You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For if God in love did not spare His Son
But He gave Him up for His chosen ones
How much more will He freely give to us
Who call upon His name?
Who call upon His name?
Who call upon His name?
Who call upon His name?
